mapper.select: SELECT T1.ID AS ID , T1.MST_CORPNAME AS MST_CORPNAME , T1.MST_PARTNAME AS MST_PARTNAME , T1.MST_CREATE_USER AS MST_CREATE_USER , T1.MST_ADMIN_USER AS MST_ADMIN_USER , REPLACE(SPLIT_PART(T1.MST_REGISTERED, ' ',1),'/','-') AS MST_REGISTERED , T1.MST_STATUS AS MST_STATUS , T1.MST_PASSWORD AS MST_PASSWORD , T1.MST_ADMINPWD AS MST_ADMINPWD , T1.MST_READPWD AS MST_READPWD , T1.MST_ACCESS AS MST_ACCESS , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TN_FEIS_MSE_FIELDINFO T2 WHERE T2.MST_ID = T1.ID) AS TOTCNT , (SELECT DISTINCT T2.SVY_STEP FROM TN_FEIS_MSE_FIELDINFO T2 WHERE T2.MST_ID = T1.ID) AS SVY_STEP FROM TN_FEIS_MSE_CNRSSPCE T1 WHERE 1=1 AND T1.ID = #{id}
SELECT MST_PASSWORD, MST_READPWD, MST_ADMINPWD, MST_CORPNAME, MST_PARTNAME FROM TN_FEIS_MSE_CNRSSPCE WHERE ID = #{mst_id}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TN_FEIS_MSE_CNRSSPCE WHERE 1=1 AND ID = #{mst_id}

SELECT ID, MST_CORPNAME, MST_PARTNAME, MST_CREATE_USER, MST_ADMIN_USER, MST_STATUS FROM TN_FEIS_MSE_CNRSSPCE WHERE 1=1 AND (MST_CORPNAME LIKE CONCAT ('%', #{keyword},'%') OR MST_PARTNAME LIKE CONCAT ('%', #{keyword},'%'))
AND ID = #{mst_id} LIMIT 1

SELECT T1.ID , T1.TYPE , T1.YEAR , T1.REGION1 , T1.REGION2 , T1.WRITER , T1.CREATEDT FROM TN_FEIS_FCK_MSESTRIPLAND T1 LEFT OUTER JOIN TN_FEIS_MSE_FIELDINFO T2 ON T1.ID = T2.SVY_LABEL WHERE 1=1 AND T2.SVY_LABEL IS NULL ORDER BY T1.CREATEDT DESC

SELECT T1.ID , T1.TYPE , T1.YEAR , T1.REGION1 , T1.REGION2 , T1.SD , T1.SGG , T1.EMD , T1.RI , T1.JIBUN , T1.LON , T1.LAT , ST_ASTEXT(T1.GEOM) AS GEOM , T1.CREATEDT , T1.WRITER FROM TN_FEIS_FCK_MSESTRIPLAND T1 WHERE 1=1 AND T1.id= #{id}

SELECT REGEXP_REPLACE(SVY_ATTR,'\\\\"\\\\" N"|\\\\"\\\\" E"|\d""','\""','g')::JSON->0->>'VALUE' AS ID , REGEXP_REPLACE(SVY_ATTR,'\\\\"\\\\" N"|\\\\"\\\\" E"|\d""','\""','g')::JSON->1->>'VALUE' AS TYPE , SVY_TAG1 , REGEXP_REPLACE(SVY_ATTR,'\\\\"\\\\" N"|\\\\"\\\\" E"|\d""','\""','g')::JSON->4->>'VALUE' AS SVY_SD , REGEXP_REPLACE(SVY_ATTR,'\\\\"\\\\" N"|\\\\"\\\\" E"|\d""','\""','g')::JSON->5->>'VALUE' AS SVY_SGG , REGEXP_REPLACE(SVY_ATTR,'\\\\"\\\\" N"|\\\\"\\\\" E"|\d""','\""','g')::JSON->6->>'VALUE' AS SVY_EMD , REGEXP_REPLACE(SVY_ATTR,'\\\\"\\\\" N"|\\\\"\\\\" E"|\d""','\""','g')::JSON->7->>'VALUE' AS SVY_RI , REGEXP_REPLACE(SVY_ATTR,'\\\\"\\\\" N"|\\\\"\\\\" E"|\d""','\""','g')::JSON->8->>'VALUE' AS SVY_JIBUN FROM TN_FEIS_MSE_FIELDINFO WHERE 1=1 AND MST_ID = CAST(#{MST_ID} AS INT)
AND REGEXP_REPLACE(SVY_ATTR,'\\\\"\\\\" N"|\\\\"\\\\" E"|\d""','\""','g')::JSON->0->>'VALUE' LIKE CONCAT ('%', #{svyid},'%')
AND REGEXP_REPLACE(SVY_ATTR,'\\\\"\\\\" N"|\\\\"\\\\" E"|\d""','\""','g')::JSON->4->>'VALUE' = (SELECT CTPRVN_NM FROM TF_FEIS_CTPRVN WHERE CTPRVN_COD = #{svySd})
AND REGEXP_REPLACE(SVY_ATTR,'\\\\"\\\\" N"|\\\\"\\\\" E"|\d""','\""','g')::JSON->5->>'VALUE' = (SELECT SIGNGU_NM FROM TF_FEIS_SIGNGU WHERE SIGNGU_COD = #{svySgg})
AND REGEXP_REPLACE(SVY_ATTR,'\\\\"\\\\" N"|\\\\"\\\\" E"|\d""','\""','g')::JSON->6->>'VALUE' = (SELECT EMD_NM FROM TF_FEIS_EMD WHERE EMD_CODE = #{svyEmd})
AND REGEXP_REPLACE(SVY_ATTR,'\\\\"\\\\" N"|\\\\"\\\\" E"|\d""','\""','g')::JSON->7->>'VALUE' = (SELECT LI_NM FROM TF_FEIS_LI WHERE LI_CODE = #{svyRi})
LIMIT #{recordCountPerPage} OFFSET #{firstIndex}

SELECT COUNT(*) TOTCNT FROM TN_FEIS_MSE_FIELDINFO WHERE 1=1 AND MST_ID = CAST(#{MST_ID} AS INT)
AND REGEXP_REPLACE(SVY_ATTR,'\\\\"\\\\" N"|\\\\"\\\\" E"|\d""','\""','g')::JSON->0->>'VALUE' LIKE CONCAT ('%', #{svyid},'%')
AND REGEXP_REPLACE(SVY_ATTR,'\\\\"\\\\" N"|\\\\"\\\\" E"|\d""','\""','g')::JSON->4->>'VALUE' = (SELECT CTPRVN_NM FROM TF_FEIS_CTPRVN WHERE CTPRVN_COD = #{svySd})
AND REGEXP_REPLACE(SVY_ATTR,'\\\\"\\\\" N"|\\\\"\\\\" E"|\d""','\""','g')::JSON->5->>'VALUE' = (SELECT SIGNGU_NM FROM TF_FEIS_SIGNGU WHERE SIGNGU_COD = #{svySgg})
AND REGEXP_REPLACE(SVY_ATTR,'\\\\"\\\\" N"|\\\\"\\\\" E"|\d""','\""','g')::JSON->6->>'VALUE' = (SELECT EMD_NM FROM TF_FEIS_EMD WHERE EMD_CODE = #{svyEmd})
AND REGEXP_REPLACE(SVY_ATTR,'\\\\"\\\\" N"|\\\\"\\\\" E"|\d""','\""','g')::JSON->7->>'VALUE' = (SELECT LI_NM FROM TF_FEIS_LI WHERE LI_CODE = #{svyRi})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM TN_FEIS_MSE_CNRSSPCE WHERE ID = CAST(#{id} as INT)
DELETE FROM TN_FEIS_MSE_FIELDINFO WHERE MST_ID = CAST(#{id} as INT)
DELETE FROM TN_FEIS_MSE_SVYCOMPT WHERE MST_ID = CAST(#{id} as INT)
mapper.select: SELECT REGEXP_REPLACE(T1.SVY_ATTR,'\\\\"\\\\" N"|\\\\"\\\\" E"|\d""','\""','g')::JSON->0->>'VALUE' AS ID , REGEXP_REPLACE(T1.SVY_ATTR,'\\\\"\\\\" N"|\\\\"\\\\" E"|\d""','\""','g')::JSON->1->>'VALUE' AS TYPE , SPLIT_PART(ST_ASLATLONTEXT(ST_TRANSFORM(ST_GEOMFROMTEXT(T1.SVY_DATA,5186),4326) ,'D°M''SS.SS"C'),' ',2) AS LON , SPLIT_PART(ST_ASLATLONTEXT(ST_TRANSFORM(ST_GEOMFROMTEXT(T1.SVY_DATA,5186),4326) ,'D°M''SS.SS"C'),' ',1) AS LAT , REGEXP_REPLACE(T1.SVY_ATTR,'\\\\"\\\\" N"|\\\\"\\\\" E"|\d""','\""','g')::JSON->3->>'VALUE' AS SD , REGEXP_REPLACE(T1.SVY_ATTR,'\\\\"\\\\" N"|\\\\"\\\\" E"|\d""','\""','g')::JSON->4->>'VALUE' AS SGG , REGEXP_REPLACE(T1.SVY_ATTR,'\\\\"\\\\" N"|\\\\"\\\\" E"|\d""','\""','g')::JSON->5->>'VALUE' AS EMD , REGEXP_REPLACE(T1.SVY_ATTR,'\\\\"\\\\" N"|\\\\"\\\\" E"|\d""','\""','g')::JSON->6->>'VALUE' AS RI , REGEXP_REPLACE(T1.SVY_ATTR,'\\\\"\\\\" N"|\\\\"\\\\" E"|\d""','\""','g')::JSON->7->>'VALUE' AS JIBUN , (COALESCE(NULLIF(REPLACE(T2.SVY_MEMO ,'\\','\'),''),'{}'))::JSON->>'완료' AS AT FROM TN_FEIS_MSE_FIELDINFO T1 LEFT OUTER JOIN TN_FEIS_MSE_SVYCOMPT T2 ON T1.MST_ID = T2.MST_ID AND T1.SVY_LABEL = T2.SVY_LABEL WHERE 1=1 AND T1.MST_ID = CAST(#{MST_ID} AS INT)
SELECT MAX(SPLIT_PART((SPLIT_PART(MST_REGISTERED, ' ',1)),'/',1)) AS svyYear FROM TN_FEIS_MSE_CNRSSPCE
SELECT DISTINCT SPLIT_PART((SPLIT_PART(MST_REGISTERED, ' ',1)),'/',1) AS svyYear FROM TN_FEIS_MSE_CNRSSPCE ORDER BY svyYear DESC
SELECT COUNT(MST_PARTNAME) FROM TN_FEIS_MSE_CNRSSPCE WHERE MST_PARTNAME=#{MST_PARTNAME}

SELECT GID AS SMID , COALESCE(SVY_MEMO::JSON->>'조사ID', '') AS SVYID , COALESCE(SVY_MEMO::JSON->>'조사유형', '') AS SVYTYPE , COALESCE(SVY_MEMO::JSON->>'종류', '') AS KND , COALESCE(SVY_MEMO::JSON->>'형식', '') AS ECNRFORM , COALESCE(SVY_MEMO::JSON->>'사방댐관리번호', '') AS ECNRRNUM , COALESCE(SVY_MEMO::JSON->>'점검일시', '') AS SVYDT , COALESCE(SVY_MEMO::JSON->>'국가지점번호', '') AS NATIONSPOTNUM , COALESCE(SVY_MEMO::JSON->>'점검자', '') AS CHKUSER , COALESCE(SVY_MEMO::JSON->>'시도', '') AS SVYSD , COALESCE(SVY_MEMO::JSON->>'시군구', '') AS SVYSGG , COALESCE(SVY_MEMO::JSON->>'읍면동', '') AS SVYEMD , COALESCE(SVY_MEMO::JSON->>'리', '') AS SVYRI , COALESCE(SVY_MEMO::JSON->>'지번', '') AS SVYJIBUN , COALESCE(SVY_MEMO::JSON->>'위도도', '') AS SVYLATD , COALESCE(SVY_MEMO::JSON->>'위도분', '') AS SVYLATM , COALESCE(SVY_MEMO::JSON->>'위도초', '') AS SVYLATS , COALESCE(SVY_MEMO::JSON->>'경도도', '') AS SVYLOND , COALESCE(SVY_MEMO::JSON->>'경도분', '') AS SVYLONM , COALESCE(SVY_MEMO::JSON->>'경도초', '') AS SVYLONS , COALESCE(SVY_MEMO::JSON->>'시설제원_년도', '') AS FCLTYEAR , COALESCE(SVY_MEMO::JSON->>'시설제원_상장', '') AS FCLTUPRHG , COALESCE(SVY_MEMO::JSON->>'시설제원_하장', '') AS FCLTLWRHG , COALESCE(SVY_MEMO::JSON->>'시설제원_유효고', '') AS FCLTSTKHG , COALESCE(SVY_MEMO::JSON->>'본댐_측정값', '') AS ORGINLDAMVAL , COALESCE(SVY_MEMO::JSON->>'본댐_판정값', '') AS ORGINLDAMJDGVAL , COALESCE(SVY_MEMO::JSON->>'측벽_측정값', '') AS SIDEWALLVAL , COALESCE(SVY_MEMO::JSON->>'측벽_판정값', '') AS SIDEWALLJDGVAL , COALESCE(SVY_MEMO::JSON->>'물받이_측정값', '') AS DWNSPTVAL , COALESCE(SVY_MEMO::JSON->>'물받이_판정값', '') AS DWNSPTJDGVAL , COALESCE(SVY_MEMO::JSON->>'종합의견1', '') AS OPINION1 , COALESCE(SVY_MEMO::JSON->>'종합의견2', '') AS OPINION2 , COALESCE(SVY_MEMO::JSON->>'종합의견3', '') AS OPINION3 , COALESCE(SVY_MEMO::JSON->>'종합의견4', '') AS OPINION4 , COALESCE(SVY_MEMO::JSON->>'종합의견5', '') AS OPINION5 , COALESCE(SVY_MEMO::JSON->>'지정면적', '') AS DSGAREA , COALESCE(SVY_MEMO::JSON->>'시설제원_길이', '') AS FCLTLNG , COALESCE(SVY_MEMO::JSON->>'시설제원_폭', '') AS FCLTRNG , COALESCE(SVY_MEMO::JSON->>'시설제원_깊이', '') AS FCLTDEPT , COALESCE(SVY_MEMO::JSON->>'골막이_측정값', '') AS CHKDAMVAL , COALESCE(SVY_MEMO::JSON->>'골막이_판정값', '') AS CHKDAMJDGVAL , COALESCE(SVY_MEMO::JSON->>'기슭막이_측정값', '') AS RVTMNTVAL , COALESCE(SVY_MEMO::JSON->>'기슭막이_판정값', '') AS RVTMNTJDGVAL , COALESCE(SVY_MEMO::JSON->>'저사상태_측정값', '') AS SNDDPSITVAL , COALESCE(SVY_MEMO::JSON->>'저사상태_판정값', '') AS SNDDPSITJDGVAL , COALESCE(SVY_MEMO::JSON->>'바닥막이_측정값', '') AS GRDSTABLVAL , COALESCE(SVY_MEMO::JSON->>'바닥막이_판정값', '') AS GRDSTABLJDGVAL , COALESCE(SVY_MEMO::JSON->>'보강시설_측정값', '') AS REINFCVAL , COALESCE(SVY_MEMO::JSON->>'보강시설_판정값', '') AS REINFCJDGVAL , COALESCE(SVY_MEMO::JSON->>'보호시설_측정값', '') AS PRTCVAL , COALESCE(SVY_MEMO::JSON->>'보호시설_판정값', '') AS PRTCJDGVAL , COALESCE(SVY_MEMO::JSON->>'배수시설_측정값', '') AS DRNGVAL , COALESCE(SVY_MEMO::JSON->>'배수시설_판정값', '') AS DRNGJDGVAL , COALESCE(SVY_MEMO::JSON->>'수문_판정값', '') AS FLUGTJDGVAL , COALESCE(SVY_MEMO::JSON->>'식생상태_판정값', '') AS VTNSTTUSJDGVAL , COALESCE(SVY_MEMO::JSON->>'안전시설_판정값', '') AS SFFCJDGVAL , COALESCE(SVY_MEMO::JSON->>'접근도로_판정값', '') AS ACCSSRDJDGVAL , COALESCE(SVY_MEMO::JSON->>'기타_판정값', '') AS ETCJDGVAL , COALESCE(SVY_MEMO::JSON->>'사면상태_판정값', '')AS SLOPEJDGVAL , COALESCE(SVY_MEMO::JSON->>'최종점검결과', '') AS FCKRSLT , COALESCE(SVY_MEMO::JSON->>'조치사항', '') AS MNGMTR , COALESCE(SVY_MEMO::JSON->>'지정해제', '') AS APPNRELIS , COALESCE(SVY_MEMO::JSON->>'일련번호', '') AS SN , COALESCE(SVY_MEMO::JSON->>'속칭', '') AS COMMONLY , COALESCE(SVY_MEMO::JSON->>'계류상태_판정값', '') AS MOORINGJDGVAL , COALESCE(SVY_MEMO::JSON->>'기타_특이사항', '') AS ETCSPECIALNOTE , COALESCE(SVY_MEMO::JSON->>'주요시설_특이사항', '') AS MAINFCLTSPECIALNOTE , COALESCE(SVY_MEMO::JSON->>'부대시설_특이사항', '') AS SUBFCLTSPECIALNOTE , COALESCE(SVY_MEMO::JSON->>'종점위도', '') AS eLatD , COALESCE(SVY_MEMO::JSON->>'종점위분', '') AS eLatM , COALESCE(SVY_MEMO::JSON->>'종점위초', '') AS eLatS , COALESCE(SVY_MEMO::JSON->>'종점경도', '') AS eLonD , COALESCE(SVY_MEMO::JSON->>'종점경분', '') AS eLonM , COALESCE(SVY_MEMO::JSON->>'종점경초', '') AS eLonS , SPLIT_PART(ST_ASLATLONTEXT(ST_TRANSFORM(ST_GEOMFROMTEXT(SVY_DATA,5186),4326) ,'D°M''SS.SS"C'),' ',2) AS SVYLON , SPLIT_PART(ST_ASLATLONTEXT(ST_TRANSFORM(ST_GEOMFROMTEXT(SVY_DATA,5186),4326) ,'D°M''SS.SS"C'),' ',1) AS SVYLAT , COALESCE(TO_CHAR(CREAT_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD'),'') AS CREATEDT FROM TN_FEIS_MSE_FIELDINFO WHERE 1=1 AND GID = #{smid}
mapper.update:
UPDATE TN_FEIS_MSE_FIELDINFO SET LAST_UPDT_PNTTM = NOW() , SVY_MEMO = (COALESCE(NULLIF(REPLACE(SVY_MEMO,'\\','\'),''),'{}'))::JSONB || CONCAT('{'
,CONCAT('"일련번호" : "',#{sn},'",')
,CONCAT('"조사유형" : "',#{svyType},'",')
,CONCAT('"종류" : "',#{knd},'",')
,CONCAT('"속칭" : "',#{commonly},'",')
,CONCAT('"점검일시" : "',#{svyDt},'",')
,CONCAT('"점검자" : "',#{chkUser},'",')
,CONCAT('"시도" : "',#{svySd},'",')
,CONCAT('"시군구" : "',#{svySgg},'",')
,CONCAT('"읍면동" : "',#{svyEmd},'",')
,CONCAT('"리" : "',#{svyRi},'",')
,CONCAT('"지번" : "',#{svyJibun},'",')
,CONCAT('"경도도" : "',#{svyLonD},'",')
,CONCAT('"경도분" : "',#{svyLonM},'",')
,CONCAT('"경도초" : "',#{svyLonS},'",')
,CONCAT('"위도도" : "',#{svyLatD},'",')
,CONCAT('"위도분" : "',#{svyLatM},'",')
,CONCAT('"종점경초" : "',#{eLonS},'",')
,CONCAT('"위도초" : "',#{svyLatS},'",')
,CONCAT('"시설제원_년도" : "',#{fcltYear},'",')
,CONCAT('"수문_판정값" : "',#{flugtJdgVal},'",')
,CONCAT('"식생상태_판정값" : "',#{vtnsttusJdgVal},'",')
,CONCAT('"안전시설_판정값" : "',#{sffcJdgVal},'",')
,CONCAT('"접근도로_판정값" : "',#{accssrdJdgVal},'",')
,CONCAT('"기타_판정값" : "',#{etcJdgVal},'",')
,CONCAT('"국가지점번호" : "',#{nationSpotNum},'",')
,CONCAT('"사방댐관리번호" : "',#{ecnrRnum},'",')
,CONCAT('"형식" : "',#{ecnrForm},'",')
,CONCAT('"시설제원_상장" : "',#{fcltUprHg},'",')
,CONCAT('"시설제원_하장" : "',#{fcltLwrHg},'",')
,CONCAT('"시설제원_유효고" : "',#{fcltStkHg},'",')
,CONCAT('"본댐_측정값" : "',#{orginlDamVal},'",')
,CONCAT('"본댐_판정값" : "',#{orginlDamJdgVal},'",')
,CONCAT('"측벽_측정값" : "',#{sideWallVal},'",')
,CONCAT('"측벽_판정값" : "',#{sideWallJdgVal},'",')
,CONCAT('"물받이_측정값" : "',#{dwnsptVal},'",')
,CONCAT('"물받이_판정값" : "',#{dwnsptJdgVal},'",')
,CONCAT('"저사상태_판정값" : "',#{snddpsitJdgVal},'",')
,CONCAT('"저사상태_측정값" : "',#{snddpsitVal},'",')
,CONCAT('"종점위도" : "','','",') ,CONCAT('"종점위분" : "','','",') ,CONCAT('"종점위초" : "','','",') ,CONCAT('"종점경도" : "','','",') ,CONCAT('"종점경분" : "','','",') ,CONCAT('"종점경초" : "','','",') ,CONCAT('"시설제원_길이" : "','','",') ,CONCAT('"시설제원_폭" : "','','",') ,CONCAT('"시설제원_깊이" : "','','",') ,CONCAT('"골막이_측정값" : "','','",') ,CONCAT('"골막이_판정값" : "','','",') ,CONCAT('"기슭막이_측정값" : "','','",') ,CONCAT('"기슭막이_판정값" : "','','",') ,CONCAT('"바닥막이_측정값" : "','','",') ,CONCAT('"바닥막이_판정값" : "','','",') ,CONCAT('"계류상태_판정값" : "','','",') ,CONCAT('"지정면적" : "','','",') ,CONCAT('"보강시설_측정값" : "','','",') ,CONCAT('"보강시설_판정값" : "','','",') ,CONCAT('"보호시설_측정값" : "','','",') ,CONCAT('"보호시설_판정값" : "','','",') ,CONCAT('"배수시설_측정값" : "','','",') ,CONCAT('"배수시설_판정값" : "','','",') ,CONCAT('"사면상태_판정값" : "','','",')
,CONCAT('"지정면적" : "',#{dsgArea},'",')
,CONCAT('"종점위도" : "',#{eLatD},'",')
,CONCAT('"종점위분" : "',#{eLatM},'",')
,CONCAT('"종점위초" : "',#{eLatS},'",')
,CONCAT('"종점경도" : "',#{eLonD},'",')
,CONCAT('"종점경분" : "',#{eLonM},'",')
,CONCAT('"종점경초" : "',#{eLonS},'",')
,CONCAT('"시설제원_길이" : "',#{fcltLng},'",')
,CONCAT('"시설제원_폭" : "',#{fcltRng},'",')
,CONCAT('"시설제원_깊이" : "',#{fcltDept},'",')
,CONCAT('"골막이_측정값" : "',#{chkdamVal},'",')
,CONCAT('"골막이_판정값" : "',#{chkdamJdgVal},'",')
,CONCAT('"기슭막이_측정값" : "',#{rvtmntVal},'",')
,CONCAT('"기슭막이_판정값" : "',#{rvtmntJdgVal},'",')
,CONCAT('"바닥막이_측정값" : "',#{grdstablVal},'",')
,CONCAT('"바닥막이_판정값" : "',#{grdstablJdgVal},'",')
,CONCAT('"계류상태_판정값" : "',#{mooringJdgVal},'",')
,CONCAT('"국가지점번호" : "','','",') ,CONCAT('"사방댐관리번호" : "','','",') ,CONCAT('"형식" : "','','",') ,CONCAT('"시설제원_상장" : "','','",') ,CONCAT('"시설제원_하장" : "','','",') ,CONCAT('"시설제원_유효고" : "','','",') ,CONCAT('"본댐_측정값" : "','','",') ,CONCAT('"본댐_판정값" : "','','",') ,CONCAT('"측벽_측정값" : "','','",') ,CONCAT('"측벽_판정값" : "','','",') ,CONCAT('"물받이_측정값" : "','','",') ,CONCAT('"물받이_판정값" : "','','",') ,CONCAT('"저사상태_판정값" : "','','",') ,CONCAT('"저사상태_측정값" : "','','",') ,CONCAT('"보강시설_측정값" : "','','",') ,CONCAT('"보강시설_판정값" : "','','",') ,CONCAT('"보호시설_측정값" : "','','",') ,CONCAT('"보호시설_판정값" : "','','",') ,CONCAT('"배수시설_측정값" : "','','",') ,CONCAT('"배수시설_판정값" : "','','",') ,CONCAT('"사면상태_판정값" : "','','",')
,CONCAT('"지정면적" : "',#{dsgArea},'",')
,CONCAT('"시설제원_길이" : "',#{fcltLng},'",')
,CONCAT('"시설제원_폭" : "',#{fcltRng},'",')
,CONCAT('"시설제원_깊이" : "',#{fcltDept},'",')
,CONCAT('"보강시설_측정값" : "',#{reinfcVal},'",')
,CONCAT('"보강시설_판정값" : "',#{reinfcJdgVal},'",')
,CONCAT('"보호시설_측정값" : "',#{prtcVal},'",')
,CONCAT('"보호시설_판정값" : "',#{prtcJdgVal},'",')
,CONCAT('"배수시설_측정값" : "',#{drngVal},'",')
,CONCAT('"배수시설_판정값" : "',#{drngJdgVal},'",')
,CONCAT('"사면상태_판정값" : "',#{slopeJdgVal},'",')
,CONCAT('"국가지점번호" : "','','",') ,CONCAT('"사방댐관리번호" : "','','",') ,CONCAT('"형식" : "','','",') ,CONCAT('"시설제원_상장" : "','','",') ,CONCAT('"시설제원_하장" : "','','",') ,CONCAT('"시설제원_유효고" : "','','",') ,CONCAT('"본댐_측정값" : "','','",') ,CONCAT('"본댐_판정값" : "','','",') ,CONCAT('"측벽_측정값" : "','','",') ,CONCAT('"측벽_판정값" : "','','",') ,CONCAT('"물받이_측정값" : "','','",') ,CONCAT('"물받이_판정값" : "','','",') ,CONCAT('"저사상태_판정값" : "','','",') ,CONCAT('"저사상태_측정값" : "','','",') ,CONCAT('"종점위도" : "','','",') ,CONCAT('"종점위분" : "','','",') ,CONCAT('"종점위초" : "','','",') ,CONCAT('"종점경도" : "','','",') ,CONCAT('"종점경분" : "','','",') ,CONCAT('"종점경초" : "','','",') ,CONCAT('"골막이_측정값" : "','','",') ,CONCAT('"골막이_판정값" : "','','",') ,CONCAT('"기슭막이_측정값" : "','','",') ,CONCAT('"기슭막이_판정값" : "','','",') ,CONCAT('"바닥막이_측정값" : "','','",') ,CONCAT('"바닥막이_판정값" : "','','",') ,CONCAT('"계류상태_판정값" : "','','",')
,CONCAT('"종합의견1" : "',#{opinion1},'",')
,CONCAT('"종합의견2" : "',#{opinion2},'",')
,CONCAT('"종합의견3" : "',#{opinion3},'",')
,CONCAT('"종합의견4" : "',#{opinion4},'",')
,CONCAT('"종합의견5" : "',#{opinion5},'",')
,CONCAT('"최종점검결과" : "',#{fckRslt},'",')
,CONCAT('"조치사항" : "',#{mngmtr},'",')
,CONCAT('"지정해제" : "',#{appnRelis},'",')
,CONCAT('"기타_특이사항" : "',#{etcSpecialNote},'",')
,CONCAT('"주요시설_특이사항" : "',#{mainFcltSpecialNote},'",')
,CONCAT('"부대시설_특이사항" : "',#{subfcltSpecialNote},'",')
,CONCAT('"조사ID" : "',#{svyId},'"')
,'}')::JSONB
, SVY_KEYWORD = #{svyId} , SVY_LABEL = #{svyId}
, SVY_LON = #{svyLon}::FLOAT
, SVY_LAT = #{svyLat}::FLOAT
, SVY_DATA = ST_ASTEXT(ST_SetSRID(ST_MAKEPOINT(#{svyLon}::FLOAT, #{svyLat}::FLOAT), 5186))
, SVY_ATTR = #{ATTR}
WHERE GID = CAST(#{smid} AS INTEGER)
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM TN_FEIS_MSE_FIELDINFO WHERE GID = CAST(#{smid} AS INTEGER)
mapper.select:
SELECT
ST_X(ST_TRANSFORM(ST_SETSRID(ST_MAKEPOINT(#{bpx}::FLOAT, #{bpy}::FLOAT),4326),5186)) AS BPX , ST_Y(ST_TRANSFORM(ST_SETSRID(ST_MAKEPOINT(#{bpx}::FLOAT, #{bpy}::FLOAT),4326),5186)) AS BPY
,
ST_X(ST_TRANSFORM(ST_SETSRID(ST_MAKEPOINT(#{epx}::FLOAT, #{epy}::FLOAT),4326),5186)) AS EPX , ST_Y(ST_TRANSFORM(ST_SETSRID(ST_MAKEPOINT(#{epx}::FLOAT, #{epy}::FLOAT),4326),5186)) AS EPY
SELECT DEPT_ID , DEPT_NM FROM TN_FEIS_DEPTINFO WHERE ORGNZT_ID = 'ORGNZT_0000000000000' ORDER BY DEPT_ID ASC

SELECT A.DEPT_ID , A.DEPT_NM , B.MBER_NM , B.ESNTL_ID FROM TN_FEIS_DEPTINFO A, TN_FEIS_GNRLMBER B WHERE A.DEPT_ID = B.DEPT_ID AND A.ORGNZT_ID = 'ORGNZT_0000000000000' AND B.MBER_STTUS = 'P'
AND (A.DEPT_NM LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%' OR B.MBER_NM LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%')
AND A.DEPT_NM LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
AND B.MBER_NM LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
ORDER BY A.DEPT_ID ASC

SELECT A.ESNTL_ID AS ESNTL_ID , A.MST_ID AS ID , A.USER_GRADE AS USER_GRADE , C.DEPT_NM AS DEPT_NM , B.MBER_NM AS MBER_NM FROM TN_FEIS_CNRSSPCE_AUTHORMGT A, TN_FEIS_GNRLMBER B, TN_FEIS_DEPTINFO C WHERE A.ESNTL_ID = B.ESNTL_ID AND B.DEPT_ID = C.DEPT_ID AND B.MBER_STTUS = 'P'
AND A.MST_ID = CAST(#{id} AS INT)
ORDER BY C.DEPT_ID ASC, B.MBER_NM ASC
SELECT REGEXP_REPLACE(DEPT_ID,'[^[:digit:]]','','g') AS DEPT_ID , DEPT_NM FROM TN_FEIS_DEPTINFO WHERE ORGNZT_ID = 'ORGNZT_0000000000000' AND DEPT_ID != 'DEPT_0000009000000' ORDER BY DEPT_ID

SELECT A.MBER_ID AS MBER_ID , A.ESNTL_ID AS ESNTL_ID , A.MBER_NM AS MBER_NM , A.OFCPS_NM AS OFCPS_NM , REGEXP_REPLACE(A.DEPT_ID,'[^[:digit:]]','','g') AS DEPT_ID , (SELECT B.DEPT_NM FROM TN_FEIS_DEPTINFO B WHERE B.DEPT_ID = A.DEPT_ID) DEPT_NM FROM TN_FEIS_GNRLMBER A WHERE A.INSTT_ID = 'ORGNZT_0000000000000' AND A.MBER_STTUS = 'P' ORDER BY A.DEPT_ID, ARRAY_POSITION(ARRAY['사무처장','연구조사처장','지부장','부장','차장','과장','대리','사원','계약직'],A.OFCPS_NM::TEXT)
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM TN_FEIS_CNRSSPCE_AUTHORMGT WHERE USER_GRADE != 'ADMIN' AND MST_ID = CAST(#{id} as INT)
